insights.title: Access Point Latency Impact (24)
insights.description: IOPS latency is elevated across multiple access points at the Denver, CO site.

insights.title: vGPU & Storage Bottleneck (3)
insights.description: The RAG pipeline in the “Talon-2” project at the Houston, TX site is experiencing degraded performance due to vGPU contention and vector store latency, impacting retrieval speed and overall model responsiveness.

insights.title: SLA Risk & Cost Forecast Alert – Public Cloud Overrun (3)
insights.description: Public cloud usage from the Boston, MA site is exceeding billing forecasts, triggering SLA risk due to potential resource throttling and budget overages.

insights.title: Reduce IT energy consumption across data center and cloud environments. (3)
insights.description: Evaluate server, cooling, and power usage in the data center. Recommend steps to downscale idle infrastructure, adjust cooling zones, and shift workloads to more energy-efficient nodes.
